1.content: You just got a new movie called Kingdom Hearts based off of the game through the narration of the movie. "In a world far away a lone hero appears to fight the darkness in order to save the planets and the people that live on them." A hood figure is staring at you from the screen. "You are the chosen one to save many lives." A hand comes out of the screen and pulls you in the movie but what really happened is you was just transported into another world. Now are you a boy or a girl? Now let me tell you a little about the Hero of this story, If you go with Blaze he is very confident in his skills as a warrior and he doesn't use magic for he believes those who use magic are weak and hold no honor. Now if you go with Crystal she hates to fight but she will hold her own when needed she likes to use magic and her Keyblade. Or you can make your own hero. Like all games you start off weak and become stronger as the story goes on. Even heros can turn bad for a while.
1.title: Prelude

11.content:
I am Sanna..son of the great warrior of Sora. But me, along with my old man and mom live in a dingy home in Savidor Town. I feel like i can do more, but for now i'm stuck here. I have red hair...sorta spikey...the the hair of my dad's nobody, Roxas. I have blue eyes like both my mom and dad. I weild a Katana as safety...just in case. I an do fire magic but that's it...

Sora: Sanna go and get some bread from the store please

Me: er...busy...doing........blasting..no

Dad kicks me out the house so i'm forced to go. As i walk to the store i get light headed and i faint. I re-awaken to a horrible storm...then THEY came. Dark creatures called heartless

Me: NO, THE HEARTLESS ARE SUPPOSED TO WIPED OUT...

They out number me, so i am swallowed by there darkness. I re-awaken on a platform of some kid with blue hair with a pretty awsome hat. Thats when the giant heartless attacks

Sanna: I'll just have to fight!!!!

I slice the heartless and its hand falls off and dissapears but then it grabs me

Me: AAAAAAAH

But just then my sheath starts emiting a light in the top where the blade used to be. The light blinds the heartless and it releases its grip. I then fall to the ground. but i get back up to see a giant key in my hand. I lift it and run with extraordinary speed and slice the heartless in half.

Sanna:...AWSOME!

But then i wake up in the middle of no where...what happened?
11.title: Chapter 1: A warrior is born

choices: Chapter 3: MICKEY MOUSE, OMG OMG OMG
111.content:
I come out the forest to see a giant forest.

Sanna: Hm...didn't see THAT coming...Wait...this might be the castle of Mickey Mouse. It would be awsome if he could join me on my quest to return home and vanquish all heartless. That'd be REAL awsome >_<. Better go.

So I walked more to the castle and saw some guy with blue hair casting fireball spells in the field.

Sanna: Hm?

???: FIREBALL!!! BLIZZARD!!!! LIGHTNING!!! SPECIAL SPELL...METEOR...

Nothing happened.

???: Darn...

Then suddenly he blew up and was sent flying.

???: *cough cough* Geez...I hate the affect of my own special spell backfiring.

Sanna: WOAH, that was awsome!

???: Leave the castle grounds now!

Sanna: Names Sanna, whats your?

???: YOU DEF, LEAVE!

???: Now Blu, it isn't nice to yell at strangers.

Blu: Sorry...Lord Mickey.
111.title: Chapter 2: A warrior is lost -_-"

1111.content:
Sanna: MICKY MOUSE OH MY GOD!

Mickey: Thats me. Lets go to the castle where it's more comfortable.

~~~~The Castle~~~~

Minnie: Lemonade boys?

Sanna: Thanks Queen Mouse

Minnie: *giggle* Just call me Minnie

Mickey: So Sanna what brings you here?

Sanna: I woke here...but i'm on a quest. Can you come with me?

Mickey: Not at the moment...But Blu can go.

Blu: *Cough cough* HUH. King Mickey I don't wanna go >.>

Mickey: Sorry but you have to D=

Blu: *sigh* Fine.

Sanna: Kickass, a magician is just as good as the King :D.

Mickey: Take the Gummyship labeled "Tropic".

Sanna&Blu: Yes King!

So because i dunno how to drive Blu is driving the ship

Minnie: Bye boys

Mickey: I hope you complete you quest!

Sanna: Bye Bye, BYEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

And we flew away.

Blu: You done?

Sanna: Yep. So where we heading?

Blu: Hollow Bastian.

Sanna: It's not called that anymore

Blu: Huh?

Sanna: It's called Radiant Gardens

Blu: Whatever, we're going there
1111.title: Chapter 3: Off with a team mate

11111.content:
So we arrived and landed on top a building.

???: WHOZZAT?

Sanna: Oh it's Merlin!

Blu: Wait!

I jump off the rooftop and walk to Marlin.

Sanna: Yo!

Merlin: ...

Suddenly Merlin transforms into a heartless.

Sanna: WOAH!

Blu: You idiot!

???: Fire.

The heartless died and dissapeared.. I summoned my Keyblade.

Sanna: stay away OLD MAN.

Merlin?: Old? I'm not that old kid. And I'm the REAL Merlin.

Blu jumps off the roof.

Blu: How should we know if thats true.

Sanna: Boo.

Blu: Shove it >_>

a shadowy figure is hiding right now

???: They're hassling Merlin. I'll kill them all!

Sanna: So if you are the real Merlin tell me, what does--

Suddenly I had a giant shuriken at my neck.

Sanna: HOLY CRAP O.O

???: Why are you hassling Mr. Merlin hm?!

Blu: Look you crazy--

Merlin: Yuli! Stand....DOWN.

Yuli: *Sigh* Yes Mr. Merlin.

Merlin: This is Yuli, a female ninja.

Sanna : A lot like Yuffie hm?

Yuli: I'm her daughter you dingdong.

Sanna: watch it shadow of the dips.

Yuli: Hey, i resent that!

Blu: I'm going to get supplies -_-". Sanna, lets go. !!!. Sanna?

~~~~Meanwhile in Merlins house~~~~

Sanna: Is this the book?

Yuli: Yes, and don't touch it you ding. If you do I--Sanna?

Yuli Opens the book.

Sanna: Oh crap i touched it!
11111.title: Chapter 4: Radiant Gardens Adventure!

111111.content:
Sanna: Yuli, I touched it!!

Yuli: You idiot I--

Merlin: Yuli, have you seen Sanna?

Yuli: ER, no <_<

Merlin: Are you lying?

Yuli: ER, no <_<

Merlin: ...OK then, tell me if you find him.

Yuli: Just find away out, i'll cover while you do.

Sanna: Okay, Big human!

Yuli closes the book.

Sanna: Ok so where...

???: Hello stranger.

Sanna: Hm?

???: Help me get some honey?

Sanna: Oh, it's Winnie the Pooh

Pooh: Do I know you?

Sanna: Nevermind that. where can I find the honey?

Pooh: That GIANT tree took it.

All i see is a giant tree shimmeying away.

Sanna: Hm, he isn't kidding ^_^.

I ran after the tree. Suddenly the tree stops. I stand behind another tree to spy. A zipper comes down and i see Roo. I jump and catch Roo.

Sanna: You gotta return that you know.

Roo: Let.. Go!

Roo kicks me in the face and runs. I chase after him dodging a bunch of obstacles. I finally catch him though.

???: What are you doing?

Sanna: Oh...Kanga isn't it?

Kanga: Yes...

Sanna: Well your son stole Pooh's honey.

Kanga: Roo, why'd you do that.

Roo: I meant no harm...it was just a prank D=

Kanga: Just don't do it again.

I return to Pooh with the honey.

Pooh: Thanks er...

Sanna: Sanna

Pooh: Thanks Sanna =D

Suddenly a giant keyhole appears.

Sanna: Maybe I should...

I shoot a blast from my Key into the hole and the whole place goes bright.

Sanna: UUUUGH.

Yuli: Sanna! YOU IDIOT BLAH BLAH BLAH BLAH.

Sanna: At least i'm back...but at what costs =_=.
111111.title: Chapter 4: Trapped in 100 Acre Woods

1111111.content:
So it's time to take our leave.

Sanna: Hey Merlin, mind if i take this book?

Merlin: Of course not! Take it, you seemed to have had quite the adventure in it.

Yuli&Sanna: YOU KNEW?!

Merlin: Of course! When Yuli lies she says ER in the beginning of her sentence.

Yuli: You think so HM?

Sanna: Speaking of that, Yuli, wanna join us?

Blu: HEEEEEEEEEEEEELL NO!

Yuli: Don't you worry you pants off little boy blue, i can't come.

Blu: YES, i mean...AAAAAAAAAW.

Sanna: Well why?

Yuli: Because...I have my own quest to do first...

Sanna: Fine by me =D.

I grab the book.

Sanna: Blu, time to go.

Blu: Right.

And we fly away.

Sanna: Where to?

Blu: Dunno... We gotta just find out!

*shing* BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM

~~~Meanwhile~~~

Marlin: Ready to go Yuli?

Yuli: Yeah...I'm going to Destiny Islands...
1111111.title: Chapter 5: Leggo!

11111111.content:
*On the ship*

Sanna: Blu I'm bored.

Blu: My problem how?

Sanna: It's your problem cuz you should be steering the ship.

*Blu turns around to see we're crash landing and that sanna got paws*

Blu: Where'd those paws come from?!

Sanna: What paws?

*then we crashed*

Sanna: urgh...

???: Hey you ok?

Blu: Man i got a major headache...wait where's my hat?!

???: Here. *some guy gives blu his hat but Blu sees paws*

Blu: WHAT THE! *Blue looks at himself through a river and sees he's a lion*

Sanna: I think thats Simba

Simba: Yep thats me!

Sanna & Blu: Holy Crap we're Lions!!!!
11111111.title: Chapter 6: Why am i a lion?!

12.content:
I feel.....Where am I?

I'm falling, but I don't feel afraid.

Darkness surrounds me from all sides, but it doesn't feel strange to me. Almost familiar.

A light suddenly bursts from under me, almost blinding as the air tugs though my hair.

Wait, not air. Birds.

Doves to be exact, circling until flying off towards the pitch black and disappearing from view.

Getting a better view of my surroundings, I appear to be standing on a platform made of some type of glass.

What's going on?

All your questions will be answered soon, for now just listen

I had a strong urge to ask once again, but I suddenly felt it wasn't going to be necessary.

Suddenly, three pillars uprooted from the glass. One with shield, one with a staff, and one with sword.

Power sleeps within you. If you give it form, it will give you strength.

The Power of a Warrior.

The Power of a the Guardian.

The Power of the Mystic.

Which will you decide?
12.title: girl (crystal)

choices: go test your blade and shield
122.content:
You tell the mysterious voice that you wish to have the power of the guardian.
" very wise choice. you shall be a protector of the people, a upholder of honor and justice."
you smile at the sound of that.

"may this new power serve you well."
you feel a sudden rush of energy flow through your body.
as the feeling fades, you notice a blade-looking key and a shield lying at you feet.

the voice announces.
"these will help you in your quests. The honorbound keyblade will help you to keep order among the chaos.
the shield will protect you body in times of conflict or danger.
you grab the keyblade and shield.

"where should i start?" you ask the mystery voice.
"either head to the city of chaos...vrytos...to the east...or head to the swamps of sorrow. The people living there could use your aid.
122.title: Guardian

124.content:
you frown at your choices.

"Do you have any other options? those really don't appeal to me...."
the voice laughs.

"it's been a long time since someone dared to request something other than what i had offered...very well...i shall give you three more options
if you cannot choose from these three, then you shall go as you are."

you don't want that...you want some kind of edge.
"alright, what are my options?"

I shall offer you the power of the sage, a spellcaster who is a master at wizardry.

I shall offer the power of a echomancer, a mage who specializes in manipulating the very air and sound around him.

and, i shall offer you the power of the battlemaster, a fighter who is supreme in close range combat.
124.title: another choice

13.content:
Whisper knew from a young age that she was different from others in her village.

everyone's hair was brown or black.
Her's was silver.
everyone's build was muscular...men more so than women.
her build was small and weak.
everyone had owned their own sword of sharp weapon by the age of 12.
she was 15 and owned a willow staff.

She knew she was bound for great and wonderous things...but little did she know how great or wonderous those things would be until "he" visited.
She saw the raggedy man enter town. he asked everyone he saw for food and drink, they all shooed him away because he was poor.

Whisper invited him into her house....she lived alone after all.
She said she would share what little food and water she had with the man.

the old man looked at her and said she had passed the test.
suddenly, the man vanished and the shack began to crumble.

she ran outside to find a giant god-like giant standing outside bellowing curses at the town.

"villainous humans! you retched, vile insignificant nothings! i came to you to test resolve, compassion, and understanding...yet i was greeted by greed, lust, and corruption...save for one.
The giant extends his hand and Whisper climbs upon it.

Holding her so the entire town sees, he bellows: "this simple girl showed me kindness in the face of evil, courage in the presence of fear. I shall let her decide....if you all will perish...of live to try and correct your lives!"

the entire town begs for mercy from you.
What will you decide?
13.title: the hardest choice

choices: the giant gives you a task
133.content:
Whisper thought hard about her decision.
"i don't want to kill them...but i don't want to just forgive them either."

the giant looks at you.
"what do you propose to do?
The decision comes almost instantly.

"have them prove themselves worthy. Those who fail...i'll let you do what you will with them."
the godly giant smiles.
"i like your decision...very wise."

The giant faces the inhabitants of the town.
"she has decided! you will have a chance to prove yourselves.
you all will have to show you are capable of compassion.
if you can show true respect and compassion towards your fellow humans, i shall spare your lives."

the entire town cheers and thanks you for your mercy.
you look at the giant.

"what now?"
133.title: have them prove themselves

14.content:
carlin had trained since he was young to be a member of the kings keyblade army. That was his ultimate dream.

If he passed the tests his kingdom saw fit, he could join....even though he was 17.
He got up early and eat eagerly.

"slow down honey." his mom scolded.
"you get sick and you definitely won't make it"

carlin blushed. His eagerness got the better of him alot of the time.
he would have to work on that.

"ok mom. wish me luck!" he cried as he headed out the door.
he bounded down the street and up to the castle.

the guard saw him approach and laughed silently.
"hold boy. what brings you here this morning?"

"i know the keyblade tournaments are today. i am participating."
the guard laughed loudly.

"you? a participant? you honestly expect to win?"
"yes."
"this i have to see. go on ahead and suit up."
14.title: make your own hero 2

141.content:
Carlin was excited. he was finally going to realize his dream.

half an hour later, the fights had started.
he had beaten every challenger faced against him.
there was only one left..and carlin was ready for him.

heading out there, a boy no older that 13 faced off against carlin.
the announcer spoke.
"this round has been specifically requested by the king himself. it will determine your faithfulness and dedication to the keyblade knights. begin!"

the boys rushed each other. swords clashed and shields rang. they faced off fiercely for a hour and a half before carlin got the upper hand.
his opponent lost his shield and panicked. he rushed carlin, only to be disarmed.

"i win!"
"wrong!" the announcer cried.
"i said earlier...this is a special request match. in order to win...your opponent must die by your hand."
carlin faces the kings box.
the king stands and the crowd hushes.

"it is true. at such a young age, you are unreliable. to prove to me you are capable, you must kill this boy in front of me and everyone here. do this...and the position of keyblade knight...is yours!"

carlin approaches the boy. he is sobbing.
"please...spare me....i would do...the same for you...."
141.title: the fight begins

1411.content:
Staring down at the boy, carlin feels for him.
Facing the royal box, he tosses the blade on the ground.

"pick up that blade and finish him!"
Carlin spits in the kings direction.

He is greeted with a mix of boos and cheers.
Seems some understand his motives.
"you there! Boy! Slay this defiant rebel and you may have the title of keyblade knight."

The boy stands behind him and picks the blade up.
The boy faces him with tears filling his eyes.
He hears Carlin speak to him.
"you do what your heart tells you. Whatever your decision, i will not hold it against you."

The boy stands there for a minute.
"what are you doing? Attack him! Finish this match!" the king cries outraged.
The young boy stands beside Carlin and drops the blade on the ground.

"Cowards! Guards, arrest these traitors!"
Dozens of guards flood in and take Carlin and the other boy away.
Chained up in the deepest dungeon, Carlin begins to be interrogated.

"why did you do such a thing? are you a spy perhaps? A assassin maybe?
Did someone send you?"
Carlin responds by spitting in the interrogators face.

"very well....we'll begin.
I really looking forward to this!"
Carlin screams echo throughout the dungeon
1411.title: defiant

1412.content:
Carlin stares down at the boy. he turns and faces the royal box.
"i won't."
Carlin tosses his blade on the ground.
" i surrender the match."

the king stands up outraged.
" this is a test that one of you must pass. one of you must die."
the boy stands.

" this is no test of a knights strength...a true knights knows when enough is enough. a king should know such a simple thing."
a hush fell over the crowd.
The king roared at Carlin.

"how DARE you insult your king!?"
"if this is how you rule your kingdom, then I'd proudly say it again!"

"knights! enter the arena and kill that boy!"
A dozen keyblade knights enter the arena and surround Carlin.
the lead knight speaks up.

"sir, he is unarmed....this is dishonorable."
the king scoffs.
"honor? who cares about honor? winning is all that matters in the arena!"

two other knights join rank with the leader.
"this boy speaks the truth. you are no king...just a zealot lusting for power!"
the audience gasps in shock.

"how dare you defy me....."
"the keyblade knights hearby resign from royal employ. we're leaving..."
the leader turns to Carlin.
"you're welcome to join us..if you wish."

the king fumes with rage.
"I won't have it.....royal guard...enter the arena! slaughter all inside....kill them all!!!!"

1000 royal guards swarm into the arena. you all are surrounded.
1412.title: a hard choice

14121.content:
You look around desperately.
The king glares down at you from his podium.
The royal guards have surrounded you.

Suddenly, you reach down and grasp your keyblade.
"Boy..what are you doing?"
"You came out here and defended me..now I will help defend you."
The leader of the knights smiled and nodded.

The guards roared and charged.
You fought to the best of your ability...and took down at least 20 of the guardsmen.
The rest were either slaughtered by the knights...or retreated.
You hear the king bellow.

"This is an outrage.
You will not get away with this!"
The leader tosses his hand over your shoulder.
"Let's get out of here lads.
We better get some distance before they come after us."

A cheer comes from the group of knights as you exit the arena.
As you begin to head out of town, you stop.
"Wait..."
The knights look at you.
" I'm worried about my mother.
I fear the king will take out his anger on her."

The leader nods and whispers to a couple of knights..who head back to town.
"They will escort her somewhere safe.
Now come..we must make haste."
You smile and begin to leave town once again.
14121.title: some new friends

15.content:
my name is Xero Tao Infinity,and my the symbals in my name can't even begin to descibe me.
i am part of a clan that use's the energy of the univese to create giant spells.at least we were they are all gone i am all that is left.
i have been traveling from world to world searching for my people's legndary sword the lunar fang. legend has it that who ever weild's it could cut kingdom hearts to pices.my journey has taken me to the world of twilight town to see the great yen sid,is anyone here......hello.
15.title: Xero's story

152.content:
“HHHHRRRRAAAHGH! RAH!”

What greets you isn’t a hello, but rather combat. A strong looking, brown haired young man with a Keyblade is currently fighting a ton of a Heartless in the Tram Common. You can’t count the exact number of the blighters, but you see a Reverse Armor sticking out from a ton of Soilders and some Generals. The man appears to be getting tired from fighting the Heartless, and if you don’t act now, he may get killed.

Luckly, you intend to act. You summon your Keyblade, Black Mage. It’s a very old Keyblade, older then the Keyblade Wars. It resembles an vintage key from what some worlds would call the 1700’s, with a long round black iron shaft with runes carved into it, teeth that are shaped like a wizard’s hat, and a fancy cobalt guard that covers your entire hand. Compared to today’s Keyblade wielders, you use it less for sword play(That’s not to say you can’t), and more for magic. Your whole clans used Keyblade like these.....expect Lunar Fang, which was meant as a final solution......You decide to use some restraint with this spell, as you don’t want to hurt the man as well as wiping out the Heartless.

“BLIZZARDJA!” You yell as you cast the magic on the Heartless. The whole army of dark creatures is suddenly snap frozen in massive chunks of soild ice, before shattering into harmless snowflakes. The man guards against the explosion of snow, and once the flakes have settled, he turns to look at you, wanting to say something.
152.title: A Terra-fying experience

155.content:
Xero entered the lobby of sids tower.
no-one seemed to be home when he suddenly heard a voice echoing down the spiral stairs.

"finally..it's mine...it's back where it belongs...."
xero ascends the stairs..looking for the person behind the voice.
"my blade...how i have missed you..."

xero finds the room.
entering, he sees a man, hunched over a large chest.
he holds some object in his hands.

"now that you are with me....we can start anew...."
xero steps into the room and the man becomes alert.
"master sid...is that you?"

the figure stands...it is not master sid.
He is disfigured..looks like a mix of human and heartless.
Half black hair..half rotting.
Half human face....half darkened.
Half human body...half twisted dark limbs.

"what are you doing in master sids tower heartless?"
The creature scoffs.
" I came back for what is mine....i came...for this!"

The creature holds up a red and black keyblade.
The constellation of infinite chaos embedded in the blade itself.
windows burst and harsh winds fill the room.
xero shields his eyes.

"chaos shall return....the end is coming....evil shall prevail!
I, Shota, shall bring the darkness!"

riding the wind into the distance, shota escapes with his prize.
xero hears a moan from the shadowed corner.
155.title: finding what is lost

choices: agree...if he tells you about your ancestral keyblade.
1551.content:
Yen sid lies in the dark corner....lightly coughing up blood.
"master sid...are you all right?"
Xero helps the master wizard to his feet.

"i am fine...you must be Xero tao...i knew you would arrive.
What i had not expected...was shota."
Xero looks at yen sid.

"master, what exactly did he take and why did he take it?"
"Shota is one of kingdom hearts oldest villans....he has tried conquering us for almost a century.
He is obsessed with magic and the keyblades....so he went in search of a powerful...ancient key."

"he found it...when it clasped to his hand, it did something to him.
it made him crazy...psychotic....obsessive.
The blade he found was the one you saw....the infinity."

xero laughs.
"the infinity is only a legend."
"the same can be said of the blade you seek...but both exist.
yet, the infinity is much more dangerous.
Depending on the nature of the yielder, it can bring eternal peace.....or total obliteration."

"Shota met maleificent and hades in prison 2 years ago.
he now devotes his entire cause to helping them advance their evil goals.
If he succeeds, we are all doomed."
Yen sid looks at xero tao.
"will you help us stop shota?"
1551.title: stolen!

choices: Go underway and start to explain from the verry beginning
15511.content:
"ofcorse master Sid I will help you but how am I supposed to find him and how can I fight there army alone?"
You won't be alone sora and his friends will help you along the way but they have become unreachable,it seems that a terrible cloud of darkness is surrounding there world"

Great now how am I supposed to come in contact with them?

Only through darkness can you access there world?

And how can I do that?

"with my help!"

Xero turns around the find a boy in a black and red overcoat/robe

Who are you?

Xero this is kain

Nice to finally meet one of the infinaty clan

But how do you know about my clan?

Long story I'll tell you along the way let get moveing

What about yen Sid?

Then kain summons a green heartless

Aww a heartless

No don't touch him he's not here for a fight he's one of my minions

Then the heartless begins to heal yen Sid

But how can you control the heartless?
15511.title: agree

choices: Search in holloween town or wonderland
Search in neverland or The Olympus Coliseum
155112.content:
Xero Tao watch the heartless heal Yen Sid.
He looked at Kain.
"How can you control the heartless?"

Kain sighed.
"It is a long story...almost as old as Kingdom heart itself."
Xero Tao laughs.
"Impossible..you can't be that old."

Kain glares at you.
"If you insist on mocking me..then i shall not tell you."
Xero apologizes.
" I'm sorry..i meant no offense.
Please continue."

Kain sat in a nearby chair.
"Long ago, Me, Yen Sid, and Shota were friends.
We battled invaders...monsters...villains who threatened our home.
About 12 years into our struggle, Yen Sid decided to give us both a gift.

He gave me this heartless.
Told me that it was unlike any heartless he had seen or heard of.
When I touched him, a bond formed.
We have been friends ever since."

Xero looked confused.
"What about Shotas gift?"
Kain instantly looked sad.
"He never received it.
Yen Sid had bought him the Infinite Chaos blade..without knowing its true power or purpose.
When he presented it..he recognized the blade immediately and locked it away.

Shota vowed vengeance for his betrayal and has stolen it back many times.
Each time, Yen Sid and I have defeated him and locked the blade away again.
This time, however..he is working with Hades and Maleficient.
We won't be able to defeat them all."

Kain looked at Xero.
"That is why we need your help to rally our allies and take back the blade.
If we can't the three of them will destroy everything."

Yen Sid groans as he stands.
Blood trickles from his mouth.
We need you to go ahead and see if you can discover some of our friends.
Can you do that?"

Xero Tao nods.
"Of course.
Where would you like me to start?"
155112.title: unknown information

1551121.content:
Xero Tao looked at Kain...then at Yen Sid.
" I'll start my search in Holloween Town."
Kain stepped up to you.
" I shall go with you."

"What about Yen Sid?"
"The heartless shall stay with him."
"We might need its help..."
"Xero...I can control all heartless..save for Shota.
I can also manipulate and control forms of darkness...like shadows and such."

Xero shrugged and headed outside..kain not far behind.
On their way to Holloween Town, Xero turned and faced Kain.
"You said you can't control Shota...why not?
Isn't he a heartless?"

Kain sighed.
" I have tried many times...
He may seem like a heartless...but he is actually more like a human heartless."
"What do you mean?"
"He has the benefits of a heartless: being able to jump from one darkness to another, stealing peoples hearts, but he is actually more dangerous than a heartless."
Xero glanced at him..confused.

"He craves hearts..but not like a heartless does....
He eats them....
He absorbs their strength..and makes it his own.
Over the years, he has devoured many hearts...killed many people."

Xero Tao lowered his head.
" I am sorry."
Kain never got to respond.
Somewhere down the road, they heard a woman scream.

Xero drew his keyblade...Kain drew his two blades and they ran towards the scream.
What they saw when they arrived horrified Xero more than Kain.
A heartless had drawn the heart out of a young girl and held it in it's claws.

Xero shouted at the creature.
"Put that heart back immediately!"
The creature turned and faced the heroes.

They saw it was.....
1551121.title: The enemy of my enemy

15511211.content:
Shota drooled as he stared at the heart in his hands.
Xero tao and kain had their blades out.

"Shota!"
Shota turned and faced kain.
"Well..well....kain.
What a surprise seeing you here..chasing me.
Well...not really."

"Give back the infinite chaos blade Shota."
"And who is this?
Ahhh..the hero i encountered in the tower.
What was your name again?"

Xero was angry.
"Give it back."
"Of course....but wait...
What about this?"
Shota holds the heart out in his hand...and lightly squeezes.

The girls body shivers.
"Do you want the blade..or the heart?"
"Quit it Shota!"
"Hahaha...come now Kain...you can do better than that.
Attack me...retake the heart."
He squeezes again and the body convulses.

Xero looks at kain.
"We need to do something..or she's going to die!"
Kain nods.
"Come on heroes!
Attack me.....
ATTACK ME!"

choices: Back at the castle shota's point of view

"damm shota has improved he's almost as strong as talis"

I'm sorry for this xero

Kain pushes xero to the floor and rushes towards shota

What the ...... Kain don't!!!!!

Just as shota is about to shatter the heart a keyblade flys in from the sky and slices shota's arm off

Aggghhhh

Just as a shadowy figure lands on the floor kain zooms past it and and summons his keyblade heartless key crossed with olivian to form heartless oblivion and hits shota up just as shota is sent up another shadowy figure air dashes straight down knocking shota of balance kain jumps up and grabs hands with the shadow do a sideways tornado spin and up goes kain

155112111.title: the heroes attack

choices: xero chats with riku and sora.
1551121111.content:
In the very heart of Maleficents castle, a horrible screaming could be heard by all its residents.
Shota writhed on the ground..clutching his chest.
"Well...i can only wonder what happened to you...."

Shota glanced up to see hades smugly gazing down at him.
"Begone hades...i don't need your mockery."
"You misunderstand..dear boy...i am here on Maleficents behalf.
I am here to offer you assistance."

Shota slowly forces himself to stand.
"Get to the point Hades!"
"Very well...Maleficent has her eyes set on a certain town.
You and i go there....you have your choice of hearts to consume...and raze the town to the ground."

Shota smiled..and then frowned.
" I can't go..i'm too weak at the moment....i need a heart."
Hades smiled.
"Another gift from Maleficent."
He held out a lightly beating heart.
"What?...who's...."

"This perticular heart belongs to Yuffie Kisaragi.
Maleficent had quite the fight trying to obtain it for you.
Now devour it..no worries...she won't die.
She'll just sleep until it gets returned....which i don't see you doing."

Shota took the heart in his greedy hands and swallowed yuffies heart.
"Where is the body?"
"Lying dormant in some ditch somewhere...hahaha.
Be sure to thank Maleficent when we leave."
1551121111.title: the heart of evil

15511211111.content:
Wow so your riku and sora I've beards so much about..........

Beep....beep......beep

Kain?! Kain are you there?!

This is kain what up squall?

It's yuffie she out cold and won't wake up I think she might be sick I need you help you know a lot of magic so I though you might be the one for the job

Sure I'll be right there

And how you took out organisation 13 and

Sorry to cut the chit chat short xero but we got to head over to radiant garden

Sure

Hay let take my gummy ship
15511211111.title: at holloween town

155112111111.content:
Sora, Xero Tao, and the others managed to all pile in the gummy ship and travel to the radiant gardens.
Arriving there, they instantly headed for Squalls house.
"We're here Squall..where's Yuffie?"

He leads them to the bed she lays in.
" I found her outside of town.
She doesn't respond to anything and she's ice cold.
I thought maybe you could help."

Kain walks up to her...a heartless forms out of nowhere and sniffs her body.
Squall redies to attack it.
"Calm down..he's ok.
He's with me."

The heartless finishes and looks at Kain..shaking its head.
"She has no heart."
"What?"
" I said she has no heart...
Either a heartless got her....or something worse."

"Like what?"
"Shota..."
Xero Tao was consumed by rage.
"We have to find him."
"And do what Xero?
Take the heart back?
He's most likely consumed it by now.
With his improved strength, abilities, and connections, we'd just be chasing our tails."

"So what do we do?"
A scream outside interrupted their thoughts.
"What now?"
Squall, Kain and Xero ran outside to see....
155112111111.title: What's wrong with her?

1551121111111.content:
Xero tao, Squall, and Kain watched as Nobodies danced throughout the streets.
"How did they get here?"
Kain drew his keyblades.
"I don't know, but we have to protect the gardens.
Fight them off!"

As the heroes fought off the nobodies, Hades and Shota had made their way to Hollow Bastion.
The heroes had made it into some kind of knowledge library or something.
Hades turned to Shota.
"Apparently, these fools have turned this place into a library for the greatest minds to gather....bleh!"
Hades smiled an evil smile.

"Maleficent wants me to gather all the information ansem had stored on his computer and bring it back.
You..however are to be the distraction.
While i get the files, you distract anyone who tries to play the hero...and you get as many hearts as you can gather."

Shota smiled.
All those hearts...those lovely powerful hearts...
He nodded.
"Whenever you are ready Hades..."
1551121111111.title: A means to an end

15511211111111.content:
Xero Tao glanced at the battle.
They had slaughtered what seemed like thousands, but they just kept coming.
How many were there?
Xero Tao heard Mickey somewhere.
"We have to find the leader.
We bring him down, the rest will lose their confidence."

The group cheered.
One tough looking Nobody exited the group.
"That's the leader.
We kill him..and then it's over."

Back at Hollow Bastion Library

Shota had fulfilled his part of the agreement.
He removed all the opposing forces who tried to stop them.
He then preceded to remove a couple hearts that would mean alot.
He looked in the other room and saw Hades was almost done loading the files.
He then walked into the other room..where a couple females lay unconcious on the floor.

Taking these hearts...would surely get the heroes attention.
One of the Females was Kairi..the girl Sora and riku were constantly searching for.
The other..was none other than Minnie Mouse.
Clutching the two beating hearts in his hands, Shota devoured them quickly and left the bodies for the heroes to find.
He left the room and returned to Hades.

"I take it you got your fill?"
"More than enough...14 hearts in all....including Kairi and Minnie.
Wait till they find out...hehehe."
Hades smiled.
"We have the files. Let's go."
Hades and Shota disappeared in a flash of hell fire.
15511211111111.title: neverending

155112111111112.content:
Kain assisted in the defeat of the Nobody leader...the rest fled the battle after their leader fell.
The group cheered, but Kain glanced around...he felt something was amiss.
"Let's not celebrate yet..there still might be some hiding around town.
Sora..you and Riku take the Library.
I will take the town Square...Squall and his group will split between searching and guard patrol."

Everyone nodded and headed towards their designated areas.
Kain hoped this feeling he had was wrong...but he couldn't shake it.
Whether it was right or wrong...he would know soon enough.

As Kain entered the town square, he saw it was deserted save for a few terrified citizens.
He urged them to return to their homes...just to be safe.
They nodded and ran.
Suddenly, a voice shouted to him...it was Squall.
"They found a couple more bodies at the Library...
Follow me!"
155112111111112.title: what is this...feeling...

choices: Later that day...back in Radiant Gardens....
1551121111111121.content:
Kain and the others rushed to the library..only to be horrified by the sight that awaited them.
Multiple bodies lay across the great library....cold to the touch and totally unresponsive.

Xero Tao was horrified.
"What...who..."
"Shota most likely...although i bet he had some help....look!"
Xero looked to where Kain was pointing...he saw the computer screen flashing brightly.
"What?"

"Shota was here...but he was probably either a distraction..or a guide.
He most likely took the hearts...but someone else took whatever files off that computer.
That's the real mystery...who was it and what did they take?"

Their thoughts are interrupted by a wail....ful of despair and grief.
Running into the room, they see mickey Mouse, Riku and Sora on their knees...gazing at the bodies of Minnie and Kairi.
"No...."
Kains face knots into a twisted feature of rage...he would make Shota pay for this!
1551121111111121.title: it only gets worse.....

choices: Destiny island with a dark figure watching the sunset
15511211111111211.content:
So I take it that your mission was a success? Yes maleficent we have gathered your precious files and caused a load of chaos to keep the heroes occupied! Shota said with a dark and sinister voice. Good now that I have all the data we can begin
Maleficent walks off with Hades leaving shota in the shadows, did they notice? No she has no idea I changed all the files and has no Idea that your still alive. Good when I return I will take vengeance on those who tried to kill me, shota be ready and alert that Kain is a real smart and monstrous one I only beat him when we where young cuz I had a darkness trap and even that almost didn't work so careful how you cross him cuz he has always been unpredictable! Yes master! (xehanort)!! slowly shota walks down the corridor to where the other two had gone just to keep up with there progress and his appearance as an ally which in the coming day would prove the show his true colors and his true intentiones!
15511211111111211.title: Back at the villains lair....

choices: Set a trap for shota and capture him
go interrogate other villains for clues
155112111111112111.content:
Back at the Radiant Gardens Mickey, Sora, Riku and Kain had finished moving the heartless bodies from the library to the infirmary.
"What are we going to do?" asked Xero.
Kain shook his head angrily. "Far as i'm concerned, Shota is as good as dead next time i see him."
Mickey glanced at him. "Calm down Kain..getting mad isn't going to help us."

Kain snorted and left the room..Xero Tao close behind.
"Hey..wait up. Where are you going?"
"Off to find Shota..make him give back those hearts..Yuffies, Kairi's, Minnies..and after that..i'll kill him."

Xero Tao shuddered. Hearing such dark words from kain was upsetting..let alone unnatural.
"Please Kain..just calm down and sit with us while we figure out what to do next."
Kain frowned and walked away..disappearing down the street. Squall walked up behind Xero.

"He'll be fine..just let him cool off for awhile..ok? C'mon..we need to come up with a plan."
Squall entered the meeting room and sat with the others..Xero sitting next to him at the table.
"What are we going to do? We need a plan."

1551121111112.title: Pete...out causing trouble

155112111112.content:
Within the dark reaches of the Sleeping Worlds.......upon the remains of the World That Never Was........Guess who’s plotting?

“Hmmmm....very, very interesting. I did not account for a Ancient in my grand plans....”

That’s right, Xenahort. In his hand, he twirls the keychain for the Lunar Fang. “Xeno.....Shota.......they could prove useful vessels for True Organisation XIII. The only problem would be getting control of them.”

“Hmmm....Perhaps I should keep watching how this plays out for now.”
155112111112.title: In some other world......

15533.content:
Diego
Male
16
5’5
Keyblade Wielder. Wields Foxfire, which is a Flame Liberator-style Keyblade with a flaming fox as the shaft, the head forming the teeth, and the tails forming the guard. The keychain is a fox as well, and the links are little fire balls.
Chose the Path of the Warrior, gave up the Path of the Guardian
Orange hair, grey eyes, his clothes are currently a orange shirt a fox on it with a zipper-infested jacket, and long baggy pants with the trademark big Disney orange shoes.
He doesn’t know where he came from, but he knows he can’t stay where he is forever. Where is he, anyway?

Marcus
Male
17
5’6
Dual Wielder. Wields the Keyblade Spilt, which is compressed of two parreal blades attached to a anglar guard, with half a angled heart for a keychain, and the Lockshield Meld, which is a octagon-shaped shield with a keyhole that fits Split in the middle. He can combine the two by using Split to unlock Mend to create a much bigger Keyblade called Dividing Edge.
Chose the Path of the Guardian, gave up the Path of the Mystic
Wears armor over his clothes, as he came from a medieval land of sorts. Greeves, gauntlets, leggings curiass, and a lightweight helmet adorne his randomly picked modern clothes.
His world was lost to darkness, and now he seeks to find people from his world while killing off Heartless.

info.brief_description: You are a owner of your own Keyblade. What will you do with it? Use it for good or evil?
info.description: The worlds are in chaos and alot of them are in ruin due to the darkness in peoples hearts. How ever there is a light in the darkness and that light is you. Welcome to the world of Kingdom Hearts. Let your adventure begin. Remember this even heros can turn evil.
